assignments.description: Update Record ID var to be used for output

decisions.description:
Does the sector need updating? If so then prompt user to update.
NOTE: Dependent Picklist component updates the Record Var so no need for separate assignment element after the screen.
decisions.name: Sector_Details
decisions.label: Sector Details

decisions.description:
Do the Primary/Secondary Sources need updating? If so then prompt the user to set them.
NOTE: Dependent Picklist component updates the Record Var so no need for separate assignment element after the screen.
decisions.name: Source_Details
decisions.label: Source Details

decisions.description: Did the flow update anything? If so then update the Lead record.
decisions.name: Update_Required_Decision
decisions.label: Update Required?

fields.name: Populate_Company_DT
fields.fieldText: Before you can continue you need to provide the Company that this Lead relates to

validationRule.errorMessage: Company Name must be longer than 2 characters.

fields.name: h_Enquiry_Service
fields.fieldText: Please provide the service the lead relates to;

fields.name: h_Estimated_Start_Date
fields.fieldText: The expected Start must be in the future:

validationRule.errorMessage: The start date must be in the future.

fields.name: h_Reference
fields.fieldText: Please provide a reference for the lead with {!Get_Lead.FirstName} {!Get_Lead.LastName}

fields.name: h_Error_Message
fields.fieldText:
An error has occurred when attempting to update the Lead missing data. 


An error log has been created with the following error message for the Salesforce Support Team to review:

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}
